name: M Squared Software and Services Pvt Reviews

review.title: “Software Engineer at M-Squared Software Services & Pvt Ltd”
review.pros: Pros – Can learn a lot. You can learn different technologies. Good exposure. The organization provide opportunity to learn different technologies
review.cons: Cons – Poor Compensation. Bad management. Compensation provided is among the least
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Change the top management positions
